page.title: 11Notable Events
page.content: The Grange golf course holds various tournaments.The club which was once owned by Rotherham Borough Council is now private and membership limited. Various functions such as barbecues, dancing and bonfires are held at appropriate times.The South Yorkshire and Hallamshire Association of Boys Clubs organises many events at their headquaters at Blackburn which involves using the open space which the area provides.In Spring a crosscountry event is arranged which involves children running through Barber wood around the golf course and past Thundercliffe Grange and then back to the base a course of three miles, which is repeated to make a total of six miles.Orienteering is arranged by the club during June.In Spring the chess championship are held at Blackburn Boys Club.
